LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipTrainingDecay: Adjust the rate at which training degrades A value of 1 is base speed, less decreases the rate, greater increases the rate
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipRescueLimit: Allow all 'Advanced' trainable animals to 'Rescue' irrespective of their body size
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipHaulLimit: Allow all 'Advanced' trainable animals to 'Haul' irrespective of their body size
